decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those specifed within the application form.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (A104 received 02/08/2017. A101A - A103A received 23/10/2017. A100A received 24/10/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The outbuilding hereby approved shall not be used for purposes other than those specifed on the plans hereby approved or such uses which are incidental to the application property, for the avoiudance of doubt the building shall not be used as a living room, bedroom, kitchen or as a separate unit of accommodation.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the building hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 6 - Any glazing within the doors formed in the side and rear elevations shall be obscure glazed and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
description: Demolition of an existing outbuilding and erection of a single storey outbuilding at the rear garden of the house
